Discover, Create, and Connect Through Art

At the Petaluma Arts Center (PAC), we believe in the power of art to inspire, educate, and bring people together. Located in the heart of Petaluma, our center is a vibrant community hub where artists, art lovers, and learners of all ages can explore their creativity and enjoy the transformative power of art. Petaluma Arts Center is dedicated to building our community's creative capacity by making art an increasingly vital and meaningful part of our public life.

Exhibitions

THE GALLERIES ARE CLOSED TO THE PUBLIC UNTIL JANUARY 22, 2026.

UPCOMING

Crafting Curiosity: Jan 22-Feb 21

A exhibition sharing a lineage of land stewardship and making at Petalumas Eames Ranch.  

Opening Reception: Thursday January 22, 5:30-7:30 pm

More Information

Explore the Artist Member Directory

Dive into the creative world of our artist members and discover the diverse talents within the PAC community. Whether youre looking for a specific style, medium, or commission, our directory is the perfect place to start.

See Artists Directory >

Shop Our Store (ThurSat, 12-4 pm)

The Gallery Boutique features high quality, affordable ceramics, jewelry, textiles, note cards and more, created by PAC member artists. If you would like your artwork to be considered please send your name, contact info, description of your work, price range, medium and image(s)!

Id like my work considered >

Rent Our Space

PAC is an ideal facility for meetings, classes, private parties, exhibits, and events. Space included in rental: North Gallery, G.K. Hardt Gallery, classroom, and exterior of building.
$200/hr 2-hr minimum

Please email or call 707-762-5600 >

PACs Exhibition Committee Invites YOUR Ideas for Exhibitions

PAC generates 6 shows a year with two anchor shows (our Youth and Members Exhibitions). Our juried shows define our values of community and partnership. This means we dont focus on a single artist but rather on concepts or themes that support more local and Bay Area artists. If you have curatorial experience and would like to be a guest curator, wed love to hear your ideas!

Propose Your Exhibition

Thank You to Our Sponsors

PAC extends its deepest gratitude to our generous sponsors, whose support helps us bring the beauty and inspiration of the arts to our community. Your contributions enable us to offer engaging exhibitions, educational programs, and vibrant events that enrich the lives of everyone in Petaluma.

PAC is a 501(c)(3) nonprofit organization. Every individual and business donation supports our mission to serve as a vital hub for Petaluma, an inclusive creative community center for all ages.
